com.percussion.util
Class PSBase64Decoder

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.util.PSBase64Decoder

public class PSBase64Decoder
extends Object

The PSBase64Decoder class is used to decode data from the base64 format. It is a wrapper for the Apache Commons Base64 codec.

Base64 Encoding is defined in RFC 1521.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tas Giakouminakis

Method Detail

decode

public static String decode(String in)
                     throws com.percussion.error.PSRuntimeException
Decode the specified data.

Parameters:
in - the string containing the base64 encoded data, never null
Returns:
a string containing the plain text representation of the data, never null
Throws:
com.percussion.error.PSRuntimeException - if decoding fails.

decode

public static String decode(String in,
                            String encoding)
                     throws com.percussion.error.PSRuntimeException
Decode the specified data. Convenience method for extracting strings with a specified encoding.

Parameters:
in - the string containing the base64 encoded data, never null.
encoding - the encoding string for the decoded data string. if null, the platform's default charater set is used.
Returns:
a string containing the plain text representation of the data, never null
Throws:
com.percussion.error.PSRuntimeException - if an invalid encoding name is specified.

decode

public static void decode(InputStream in,
                          OutputStream out)
                   throws IOException
Decode the specified data.

Parameters:
in - the stream containing the base64 encoded data, never null
out - the stream to store the plain text representation of the data, never null
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O exception occurs

decode

public static byte[] decode(byte[] in)
Decodes a byte[] containing containing characters in the Base64 alphabet.

Parameters:
in - A byte array containing Base64 character data, never null
Returns:
a byte array containing decoded data

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Provides a simple way to decode a base64 encoded string. Supply the text as the only argument to this method. The decoded string is printed to the console.
